message: Bob, I believe this product will be incredibly valuable to your business. To start the conversation, I'm proposing a price of $1,100,000.
Thank you for considering my business needs. I appreciate your initial offer. I would like to propose a lower price of $950,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value this product brings to your specific business model is significant.  To move forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on this product for my business, I would like to propose a price of $1,000,000.
